item.title: The Windmills of Your Mind
item.description: This song by Michel Legrand with lyrics by Alan and Marilyn Bergman is one of the trippiest songs ever written, but nobody seems to have noticed. I thought I would fix that. Please do not watch this video alone. (Someday someone will notice I am doing some interesting music and videos...)
